tooltip.nitros_twinblades.infernal_sword: Burns brighter than the flames of the Nether
tooltip.nitros_twinblades.venomous_sword: More toxic than the deadliest of poisons
tooltip.nitros_twinblades.lightning_swor: Smites your foes with the power of the heavens
tooltip.nitros_twinblades.terra_blade: Bends the ground itself to your will
tooltip.nitros_twinblades.claw_sword: Holds your foes in place with a vice-like grip
tooltip.nitros_twinblades.void_sword: Channels the power of the Void to steal your foes' life force
